au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.util

Class AxisCleaner

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.util.AxisCleaner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AxisCleaner
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Cleans Apache Axis generated temp files. These are located in the temporary directory and have the prefix axis2-tmp-
